department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The Government of Canada is requesting proposals from bidders to provide catering services for the Department of National Defence. \\
full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Dispersed Catering Services**
=============================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

**Procurement Number:** WS3981592204

**Date Published:** May 9, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 1, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Service)

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

**Notice Description:**

The government of Canada invites offerors to provide dispersed catering services to the Department of National Defence. The contract duration is expected to be until June 30, 2026.

**Requirements:**

* Offerors must demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria.
* Failure to meet the criteria will result in the offer being declared non-responsive.

**Special Conditions:**

* Stream 2 of this procurement has been set aside for the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
* To be considered, a supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business under PSIB and comply with its requirements.

**Contact Information:**

Christopher Casale
[chrishopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Contracting Entity:**

The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and
